titles.title: To establish an Independence Investment Fund to facilitate investments in companies developing critical and emerging technologies, such as biotechnology, that significantly enhance the national security and economic security of the United States, and for other purposes.

To establish an Independence Investment Fund to facilitate investments in companies developing critical and emerging technologies, such as biotechnology, that significantly enhance the national security and economic security of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
